1.「時の王者 <pc>さま。| この光を ご覧ください。: The champion of time <pc>. See this|light.

2.「この光球こそが…… グレイナル叙事詩。: This ball of light is... the Greynal epic.

3.「叙事詩といっても じつは書ではなく | かつての聖竜の 精神の残滓とでも呼ぶべ:
Epic poetry is not a book, in fact, but a|glimmer of light, a remnant of the spirit of|the once holy dragon, telling us what has|
|happened in the past.

4.「それでは 叙事詩に問いかけてみましょう。 | 我らの 歩むべき道を。: So let us ask the epic question. The path we|must take.

7.「これは……凍えきった光……。 | 幾星霜の年月を経たことで| 今は 眠りについ: This... frozen light... now seems to be asleep|after so many years.

8.「<pc>さま……。| 我ら 世告げの姫に受け継がれてきた| 伝承の中に このよ: <pc>... There is a tradition that has|been handed down to us, the Oracle Princesses,|that goes something like this.

9.「グレイナル叙事詩を 眠りから覚ますのならば| 竜の火酒を 求めよ……。| 火酒:
If you would wake the Epic of Graenal from its|slumber, seek the Dragon Sake... for the fire|wine will be borne by the fire lizards of the|
|Flaming Mountain.

10.「炎の山の火トカゲとは| ドワチャッカ大陸の カルサドラ火山に生息する| 赤き魔: The Fire Lizard of the Flaming Mountain is a|red monster <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> that inhabits|Calsadora Volcano in Dwachakka Continent.

11.「どうか その魔物を倒し| 竜の火酒を 手に入れてきてくださいまし。: Please go defeat the monster and get the|Dragon Sake.

12.「……さすがは <pc>さま。| グレイナル叙事詩を 目覚めさせるための| 竜の: ...as one would expect from <pc>. You|have received the Dragon Sake to awaken the|Graenal Epic.

13.ロディアに 竜の火酒を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Would you give Rhodia the Dragon Sake?<yesno><close>

14.「竜の火酒がなければ グレイナル叙事詩を| 目覚めさせることはできません……。|: Without Dragon Sake we cannot awaken the Epic|of Glenal... <pc> please.

15.ロディアに 竜の火酒を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Would you give Rhodia the Dragon Sake?<yesno><close>

17.「これが竜の火酒……| 強い魔力を感じます。: This is Dragon Sake...it has a strong magic|power.

18.「聖竜よ。竜の火酒を 捧げます。| どうか 目をお覚ましください……。: O holy dragon. I offer you this Dragon Sake.|Please, wake up...

19.ロディアは 竜の火酒を泉に注いだ。: Rhodia poured Dragon Sake into the fountain.

20.<center>……長い…あまりにも長い眠りじゃった。: It was a long...too long sleep.

21.「……聖竜グレイナルよ。 | お目覚めを 待ち望んでおりました。: Grainaru, the holy dragon. We have long|awaited your awakening.

22.<center>ふう…………。|ふたたび 災厄の時が訪れたか。: Well... once again, the time for disaster has|come.

23.<center>そして そこの者よ。|貴様が 時の王者……であるか？: And you, there. Are you the King of Time?

24.<center>貴様が 災厄の王への道を開くために|わしを訪ねてきたこと|このグ: I know that you have come to me to pave the|way to the King of Calamity.

25.<center>……思いだすのう。|初代王者と翔けた あの空を。: I remember. That sky where I flew with the|first champion.

26.<center>できることなら わしの翼で 貴様を|災厄の王が眠る地まで 導いて:
If I could, I would use my wings to guide you|to the land where the King of Calamity lies,|but I can no longer fly with my body like|
|this.

27.<center>災厄は 長き眠りの時代を経て|想像を絶するほどに|強大な存在へと: The plague has gone through a long period of|slumber, transforming itself into an|unimaginably powerful entity.

28.<center>ふたりめの王者の言うとおり|もはや 王者ただひとりのチカラで|打: As the second champion said, it is no longer|possible for a single champion to destroy it|by his own strength.

29.<center>ゆえに わしが|貴様に 新たなチカラを授けてやろう。: Therefore, I will give you new power.

31.<center>そのカギは 王者の資格を持つ者同士を|巡り合わせるためのもの。: The Champion's Key is meant to bring those who|qualify for the Champion's Key to each other.

32.<center>名などない物だが……そうじゃな。|王者のカギとでも 名付けるとし: It has no name, but... well, let's call it the|key of champions. Let's call it Champion's|Key.

33.<center>そのカギに導かれ 集まった者同士が|同盟を組んだならば ８人のチ:
If those who are guided by that key and gather|together form an alliance, they will be able|to unite the power of eight persons to|
|challenge the King of Calamity.

34.<center>たとえ ひとりでは敵わぬとも|８人の王者のチカラが集えば|かの災: Even though one person may not be able to|defeat a disaster, the power of eight|champions may come together to defeat it.

35.<center>さあ 行け 時の王者よ。|貴様自身の手で 地獄の門を開き|地獄の: Go now, champion of time. With your own hands,|open the gates of hell and soar through it!

36.<center>わしは 今一度 長き…長き眠りにつき|次代…の 到来…を待と…う: I shall once again sleep the long sleep and|wait for the coming of the next generation.

37.「時の王者 <pc>さま……。| 私は このカギを手に 落陽の草原へ戻り| <p: Champion's Key and I will return to Sunset|Meadow to await <pc>.

38.「ついに 災厄の王との決戦となります。 | 充分に備えて いらしてください。|:
At last, the battle against the King of|Calamity is about to begin. Please be well|prepared. Please make use of this for the|
|battle.

39.「落陽の草原の 光の河……。| そこより 地獄の門を開きましょう。: Rivers of light in the Sunset Meadow... from|there, let us open the gates of hell.
